description: Columbine is a mesmerizing and unique wildflower native to North America. With a variety of colors, from deep blue to white and yellow to vibrant red and purple, columbine flowers are a stunning sight. Columbine is a hardy flower that grows nearly everywhere in the U.S. â€“ in both wet and dry soils. It is also a popular choice among gardeners as it thrives in part-shade to full sun gardens. Not only incredibly beautiful, columbine also is a strong pollinator attractor and hummingbird favorite, making it a great choice if you are looking to attract wildlife to you garden.
